div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1591 Tyre (mod. Sur) or Beirut environs, Phoenicia, 1954 Burial: c. 145 B.C. (Westermark) Contents: 20+ AR Alexander I: 1 tetradr. (Berytus? yr. 163, as BMC 5) Demetrius II: 2 tetradr. (Tyre, yr. 167; Sidon, yr. illeg.) Ptolemy VI: 17 didr. (unc. mint, yrs. 110, 112-116 and illeg.; as Svoronos 1217- 26) Disposition: dispersed Rubbings in Copenhagen For the dating of the Ptol. didr. cf. Newell, Standard Ptol. Silver
